title: Deals: Apple iPad Air 5 Magic Keyboard $239, AirPods Max $100 off, DJI OM 4 SE $99, more
content:
Headlining the best discounts for this Tuesday, Apple’s white Magic Keyboard for iPad Air 5 has hit a new all-time low at $239. That’s alongside AirPods Max in all five colors at $100 off and the first DJI OM 4 SE 3-axis iPhone gimbal discount. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Apple iPad Air 5 Magic Keyboard $239, AirPods Max $100 off, DJI OM 4 SE $99, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple's official white iPad Air 5 Magic Keyboard has dropped to a new all-time low alongside the 12.9-inch model, plus AirPods Max and more.
